title: Identify FBD for stacked blocks in an elevator

content.question: Assume the elevator is moving at constant speed, and consider the bottom box in the stack that has two boxes of mass 2M. Let Ffloor be the force exerted by the floor on the box, Fg be the force exerted by gravity on the box, and Fbox be the force exerted by the top box on the bottom box. Which of the following best represents the forces exerted on the bottom box?

choices.label: Each option consists of a square box with directional arrows connected to either the top of the box or to the bottom of the box.  Option A. The figure shows a box connected to a vertical arrow pointing up labeled F sub floor, and a vertical arrow pointing down labeled F sub g. The arrows appear to be about equal in length.
Option B. The figure shows a box connected to a vertical arrow pointing up, labeled F sub floor, and a vertical arrow pointing down labeled F sub box. The arrows appear to be about equal in length.

Option C. The figure shows a box connected to a vertical arrow pointing up labeled F sub floor, and two vertical arrows pointing down which appear to be half the length of the arrow above. The downward arrow below the box and on the left is labeled F sub g, and the downward arrow below the box and on the right is labeled F sub box.

Option D. The figure shows a box connected to two vertical arrows pointing up and a vertical arrow pointing down labeled F sub g. The arrows on top of the box appear to be about half the length of the arrow on the bottom of the box. The upward arrow on top of the box and to the left is labeled F sub box, and the upward arrow on top of the box and to the right is labeled F sub floor.

content.answer: Option C. The figure shows a box connected to a vertical arrow pointing up labeled F sub floor, and two vertical arrows pointing down which appear to be half the length of the arrow above. The downward arrow below the box and on the left is labeled F sub g, and the downward arrow below the box and on the right is labeled F sub box.
